title: Build a Next.js Blog: A Step-by-Step Guide
summary: This guide shows how to build a blog with Next.js and Prismic using Slice Machine, Tailwind CSS, and dynamic routing.
takeaways: Use Slice Machine to model structured page types and slices
Set up Tailwind CSS and integrate with Next.js for styling
Configure routes and components to dynamically render content from Prismic
